title: Cardano Music Streaming Dapp
description: The music business infrastructure is bloated and its hard to discover global artists. Also, how do we onboard the gen population to Cardano?
solution: Build a decentralized music platform for the world. Fans pay-per-stream. Artists get paid more & quicker; they'll use it to sell records.
experience: 20 years in music business.  Tech Startup exp. Connected.  I have a plan to get every major label to use this. Then Africa. Then the world.
